elements.name: When a GET request containing invalid authorization credentials is sent to the /api/faqsList endpoint, the
elements.description: expected status code returned should be 401, and the message in the response body should confirm: "Unauthenticated.".

steps.name: The api user constructs the base url with the "invalid" token.
The api user sets "api/faqsList" path parameters
The api user saves the response returned from the api faqsList endpoint and confirms that the status code is '401' and the reason phrase is Unauthorized.

name: As an administrator, I want to be able to access the FAQ's list via API connection.
